parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Mission Information </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Enable / disable saving of the game with an optional autosave. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[enableSaving]] enable </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> enable: [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[enableSaving]] [enable, save] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> enable: [[Boolean]] - allow manual saving </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> save: [[Boolean]] - create an autosave on command execution </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[enableSaving]] [[false]];		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>saving disabled, does autosave - same as [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[false]], [[true]]]</value></part></template>
[[enableSaving]] [[true]];		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>saving enabled, doesn't autosave - same as [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[true]], [[false]]]</value></part></template>

[[enableSaving]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[false]], [[false]]];	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>saving disabled, doesn't autosave</value></part></template>
[[enableSaving]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[false]], [[true]]];		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>saving disabled, does autosave</value></part></template>
[[enableSaving]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[true]], [[false]]];		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>saving enabled, doesn't autosave</value></part></template>
[[enableSaving]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[true]], [[true]]];		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>saving enabled, does autosave</value></part></template>
</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[loadGame]], [[saveGame]], [[savingEnabled]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
